description:
The original solitaire has never been better!

Solitaire brings your favorite classic card game to your mobile phone! Join millions enjoying the classic Klondike Solitaire gameplay that provides a relaxing and peaceful experience for your daily commute, coffee break, or a quiet evening at home. Wherever you go, the fun comes with you! Now you can play Solitaire on the go with all the features you love.

FEATURES:
• 100% Free to All
• 1 or 3 Card Deal
• Detailed Statistics
• Undos & Hints
• Customize Cardbacks
• Timer, moves, and statistics
• Gorgeous Graphics
• Play OFFLINE in anytime and anywhere

NEW TO KLONDIKE SOLITAIRE?
Klondike Solitaire is played with a 52 card deck. The goal is to expose and sort all of the cards into ordered piles Ace through King by suit. To do so, you can sort the cards in the tableau (the area below the four objective piles) by alternating color descending from the King card. The end goal is to expose all of the cards and sort them into the objective piles at the top of the screen. If you can do that… YOU WIN!

So what are you waiting for? Start playing the BEST SOLITAIRE game right now!
